long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick M2 Cache Cleaner is an Google Chrome extension that makes cache cleaning in Magento 2 quicker by cleaning only the most needed components.
Features:
- Two new buttons in Cache Management page for cleaning cache.
- New keyboard shortcuts for the active Cache Management page.
- All opened Cache Management pages listed in popup.
- Quick Clean and Full Clean buttons available in popup for cleaning cache of inactive Cache Management tabs.
- Always visible number of open Cache Management pages on extension's icon.

For more Magento related services contact www.smdesign-studio.com.
